markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Choking Smoke](/Feats.aspx?ID=3392) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 125</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Smoldering Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3388)

</column>

---

When you cast [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) heightened to at least 6th level, you can modify the spell's standard effects as follows: Reduce the spell's damage by 6d6. Your fireball leaves behind a lingering cloud of toxic smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of [_stinking cloud_](/Spells.aspx?ID=309).
name: Choking Smoke
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 125</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Smoldering Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3388)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
When you cast _fireball_, you can modify it to create a cloud of smoking smoke.
</summary>
summary: When you cast  fireball , you can modify it to create a cloud of smoking smoke.
summary_markdown: When you cast _fireball_, you can modify it to create a cloud of smoking smoke.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Choking Smoke Source Grand Bazaar pg. 125 Archetype Spell Trickster Prerequisites Smoldering Explosion --- When you cast fireball heightened to at least 6th level, you can modify the spell's standard effects as follows: Reduce the spell's damage by 6d6. Your fireball leaves behind a lingering cloud of toxic smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of stinking cloud .
